# ui-input-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                | Type                     | Default  |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------ | ------------------------ | -------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Whether the input group is disabled        | `boolean`                | `false`  |
| `error`    | `error`    | Whether the input group has an error state | `boolean`                | `false`  |
| `size`     | `size`     | Size variant of the input group            | `"base" \| "lg" \| "sm"` | `'base'` |
